mapper.select: select `equipment_id`,`equipment_name`,`equipment_code`,`enterprise_id`,`model`,`buy_time`,`effect_time`,`brand`,`install_position`,`product_id`,`protection_person`,`phone_number`,`surveyted_person_name`,`surveyted_person_position`,`full_form_time`,`survey_person_name`,`create_time`,`create_user_name`,`create_by`,`modify_time`,`modify_user_name`,`modify_by`,`delete_flag`,`administrative_division`,`urbanorrural` from eco_firedevice where enterprise_id = #{value} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into eco_firedevice ( `equipment_id`, `equipment_name`, `equipment_code`, `enterprise_id`, `model`, `buy_time`, `effect_time`, `brand`, `install_position`, `product_id`, `protection_person`, `phone_number`, `surveyted_person_name`, `surveyted_person_position`, `full_form_time`, `survey_person_name`, `create_time`, `create_user_name`, `create_by`, `modify_time`, `modify_user_name`, `modify_by`, `delete_flag`, `administrative_division`, `urbanorrural` ) values ( #{equipmentId}, #{equipmentName}, #{equipmentCode}, #{enterpriseId}, #{model}, #{buyTime}, #{effectTime}, #{brand}, #{installPosition}, #{productId}, #{protectionPerson}, #{phoneNumber}, #{surveytedPersonName}, #{surveytedPersonPosition}, #{fullFormTime}, #{surveyPersonName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{createUserName}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{modifyUserName}, #{modifyBy}, '0', #{administrativeDivision}, #{urbanorrural} )
mapper.update: update eco_firedevice set delete_flag = '1', modify_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where equipment_id = #{value}

update eco_firedevice set `modify_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), `delete_flag` = '1' where equipment_id in
#{equipmentId}
